org.tarantool.core

Interface TarantoolConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SocketChannelTarantoolConnection, TarantoolConnectionImpl

    public interface TarantoolConnection
    A connection with a specific instance of tarantool
    Version:
    $Id: $
    Author:
    dgreen

      • delete

        Integer delete(int space,
             Tuple id)
        Finds tuple using primary key and removes it
        Parameters:
        space - Space to query. Should be configured in tarantool.cfg
        id - tuple which contains only primary key
        Returns:
        tuples affected

              Tuple tuple)

        tuple - a Tuple object.

        tuples replaced

      • find

        List<Tuple> find(int space,
               int index,
               int offset,
               int limit,
               Tuple... keys)
        Finds elements using selected index and matches them against specified keys
        Parameters:
        space - Space to query. Should be configured in tarantool.cfg
        index - Index to use. Should be configured in tarantool.cfg
        offset - a int.
        limit - a int.
        keys - Keys to match. If a tuple matches more than one key, it's returned twice.
        Returns:
        list of tuples matched

      • find

        List<Tuple> find(int space,
               int index,
               int offset,
               int limit,
               Collection<Tuple> keys)
        Finds elements using selected index and matches them against specified keys
        Parameters:
        space - Space to query. Should be configured in tarantool.cfg
        index - Index to use. Should be configured in tarantool.cfg
        offset - a int.
        limit - a int.
        keys - Keys to match. If a tuple matches more than one key, it's returned twice.
        Returns:
        list of tuples matched
